If we’re going to claim to value truth in the workplace, we can’t ignore basic human biology. I’m not being divisive, I’m just stating a fact that’s been known for decades.
Recommendations for Inclusive Policy Language While promoting inclusivity is vital, we must also anchor our policies in biological reality to prevent misinformation from infiltrating HR systems. Chromosome composition—specifically XX for females and XY for males—is an immutable biological marker that predates social discourse. Ignoring this in favor of fluid definitions creates operational risks in areas like healthcare benefits and facility access. I urge you to reaffirm the scientific basis in all personnel guidelines.
